original_text: But these men take things away from women after their husbands have died, even their houses. Then they pray for a long time so that other people will praise them. Because they do these things, God will punish those men much more than other people.’
korean_text: 그들은 과부의 가산을 삼키며 외식으로 길게 기도하는 자니 그 받는 판결이 더욱 중하리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: But these men take things away from women
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이 사람들은 여성들에게서 물건을 빼앗습니다

sentences.original_text: Then they pray for a long time
so that other people will praise them
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람들이 그들을 칭찬하게 하기 위해

sentences.original_text: God will punish those men much more
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그 남성들을 훨씬 더 많이 벌하실 것입니다
